chunks.zh: 首次购车， 10 公里通勤公路车推荐
chunks.en: First car purchase, 10 km commute road bike recommendation

chunks.zh:
各位大佬

我是一个完全的新手，以前从未骑过公路车，目前购车只是为了通勤代步，日常骑行逛逛，通勤距离 10 公里。
我目前考虑了以下两个选项：

迪卡侬 RC100：
优点：外观简洁大方，价格相对亲民（约 1799 元），适合初学者入门。
担忧：本地没有迪卡侬门店，担心后续维护和调试不便。

喜德盛 AD350：
优点：设计时尚，活动価约为 3200 元，预算勉强可以接受。
担忧：网上看了一圈都说是网红款 xds 是修的爽，真的有这么不堪嘛?

考虑到我的具体情况——居住地周围有捷安特和喜德盛门店，但无迪卡侬门店——我希望得到大家的意见，特别是那些有类似经历或对这两个品牌有深入了解的朋友。请问：

在预算有限的情况下，您认为哪一个选择更适合我或者有更好的推荐？谢谢🙏
chunks.en:
Hello everyone,

I am a complete beginner and have never ridden a road bike before. I am buying a bike for commuting and everyday leisure riding. The commute distance is 10 kilometers.
I am currently considering the following two options:

Decathlon RC100:
Pros: Simple and elegant appearance, relatively affordable price (about 1799 yuan), suitable for beginners.
Cons: There is no Decathlon store locally, and I am worried about maintenance and debugging issues.

Xidesheng AD350:
Pros: Stylish design, promotional price of about 3200 yuan, the budget is barely acceptable.
Cons: I've seen online that it's a popular model, and people say Xidesheng is a pain to repair. Is it really that bad?

Considering my specific situation - there are Giant and Xidesheng stores around my residence, but no Decathlon store - I would like to get your opinions, especially from those with similar experiences or in-depth knowledge of these two brands. Please tell me:

Given my limited budget, which option do you think is more suitable for me, or do you have better recommendations? Thanks 🙏

chunks.zh: 我就是单程 10km 通勤，已经骑车上下班 2 年多了，每天上下班路线以城市路线为主，但路线上总有一段是正在修的烂路。
chunks.en: I commute 10km each way and have been cycling to and from work for more than 2 years. The daily commute is mainly on city roads, but there is always a section of bad road under construction.

chunks.zh: 尝试过朋友的公路车，虽然理论速度快，但是一路有红绿灯和时常出现的坑洼路段根本也提不起速，同时还得担心车别受损。
chunks.en: I tried my friend's road bike. Although the theoretical speed is fast, the traffic lights and frequent potholes on the road make it impossible to pick up speed, and I also have to worry about the bike being damaged.

chunks.zh: 后来还是决定入了平把公路捷安特 escape 1 ，很综合的车，适合通勤。
chunks.en: Later, I decided to get a flat-bar road Giant Escape 1, a very versatile bike suitable for commuting.

chunks.zh: 装个后货架放包拉东西，就不用自己背包弄一身汗了。
chunks.en: Install a rear rack to put your bag and pull things, so you don't have to carry a backpack and get all sweaty.

chunks.zh: 楼主参考一下
chunks.en: OP, please take a look.

chunks.zh: 个人骑车通勤记录：小电驴->山地车->平把公路车->弯把公路车->平把公路车->小电驴只是简单通勤玩玩的话，平把公路车是最舒服的，弯把车适合用来锻炼
chunks.en: My personal cycling commute history: electric scooter -> mountain bike -> flat-bar road bike -> drop-bar road bike -> flat-bar road bike -> electric scooter. If you just want to commute and have fun, a flat-bar road bike is the most comfortable. A drop-bar bike is suitable for exercising.

chunks.zh: 通勤车别买的太好的，要不然丢了可惜
chunks.en: Don't buy too good of a commuter bike, otherwise it's a pity if it gets stolen.

chunks.zh: 路面好吗？
chunks.en: Is the road surface good?

chunks.zh: 公路车容易爆胎。
chunks.en: Road bikes are prone to punctures.

chunks.zh: 推荐 RC100 ，综合车架骑起来比较舒适，AD350 是气动车架，几何相比综合是有点激进的，另外如果有 3K 的预算可以看看新的 VOOK ONE 这辆车
chunks.en: I recommend the RC100. The integrated frame is more comfortable to ride. The AD350 is an aerodynamic frame, and the geometry is a bit more aggressive compared to the integrated one. Also, if you have a budget of 3K, you can take a look at the new VOOK ONE bike.

chunks.zh: 10km 啊，这个距离貌似自行车可能不经常锻炼的人需要 30 分钟以上，如果天天通勤骑行，有一点点累年轻的话还好说年纪大点简直是煎熬➕折磨我现在放弃了，小电驴每天嘟嘟嘟的跑，所以现在肥的要命唉😮‍💨
chunks.en: 10km, it seems that it may take more than 30 minutes for people who don't exercise often to ride a bicycle for this distance. If you commute by bike every day, it's okay if you're a little tired when you're young, but it's a torture if you're older. I gave up now, and the electric scooter runs every day, so I'm terribly fat 😮‍💨

chunks.zh: 我去年买了二手的 ad350 ，骑了几百公里除了偶尔有点异响之外没有别的问题，，当然我也没骑过别的车
chunks.en: I bought a used AD350 last year. I rode it for hundreds of kilometers and had no problems except for occasional abnormal noises. Of course, I haven't ridden other bikes.

chunks.zh: 推荐是附近有什么车店买什么车，只是通勤不要买喜德盛的 AD 或者 RS 系列了，看看极速系列的平把公路车，骑起来会比较舒适
chunks.en: The recommendation is to buy whatever bike shop is nearby. If you're just commuting, don't buy Xidesheng's AD or RS series. Take a look at the flat-bar road bikes in the Speed ​​series, which are more comfortable to ride.

chunks.zh: 提点预算上斯特拉
chunks.en: Raise your budget a bit for a Stella

chunks.zh: 我买的 ad350 ，倒是没碰到啥问题。
chunks.en: I bought the ad350 and haven't encountered any problems.

chunks.zh: 通勤 10km 还是买个舒服点的车吧。
chunks.en: For a 10km commute, buy a more comfortable bike.

chunks.zh: 推荐捷安特
chunks.en: Recommend Giant

chunks.zh: @liu731 路面很好
chunks.en: @liu731 The road surface is very good

chunks.zh: 还以为你要买汽车，打扰
chunks.en: I thought you were going to buy a car, sorry to bother you.

chunks.zh: @tbv 推荐 GIANT ，但是我觉得可以试试 XC （比如 GIANT ATX 系列）
chunks.en: @tbv Recommend GIANT, but I think you can try XC (such as the GIANT ATX series)

chunks.zh: @LuxChen 我其实也想买 RC100 但是我没有任何修车经验，而且本地也没有迪卡侬门店售后，担心售后问题
chunks.en: @LuxChen I actually want to buy RC100 but I have no car repair experience and there is no Decathlon store after-sales service locally, I am worried about after-sales issues

chunks.zh: @18115692244 我经常徒步 10KM+，还是要多锻炼下
chunks.en: @18115692244 I often walk 10KM+, you still need to exercise more

chunks.zh: @panlista 谢谢
chunks.en: @panlista Thanks

chunks.zh: 新手不建议骑弯把车，平把完全满足通勤和操控。
chunks.en: It is not recommended for beginners to ride drop-bar bikes. Flat bars fully meet the needs of commuting and handling.

chunks.zh: 我觉得只可以跑公路的公路车一点意义没有，随便一台电鸡就把你超了。
chunks.en: I don't think road bikes that can only run on roads have any meaning. Any electric scooter can overtake you.

chunks.zh: 自行车应该用来走些非铺装路面，甚至要抗车的路才是发挥优势的地方。
chunks.en: Bicycles should be used to ride on some unpaved roads, and even roads where you have to carry the bike are where their advantages can be brought into play.

chunks.zh: 如果之前没怎么骑过车的话，建议先整个便宜点的山地骑一骑找找手感，上来就公路车不是很安全
chunks.en: If you haven't ridden much before, I suggest getting a cheaper mountain bike to get a feel for it. It's not very safe to start with a road bike.

chunks.zh: @LuxChen 谢谢 个人感觉平把有点丑 哈哈
chunks.en: @LuxChen Thanks! I personally think flat bars are a bit ugly haha
